channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-50946] When using Java version 17.0.14, the `SPARK-35907: createDirectory` test in UtilsSuite will fail.
item.description:
java -version
openjdk version "17.0.13" 2024-10-15 LTS
OpenJDK Runtime Environment Zulu17.54+21-CA (build 17.0.13+11-LTS)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Zulu17.54+21-CA (build 17.0.13+11-LTS, mixed mode, sharing)


build/sbt clean "core/testOnly org.apache.spark.util.UtilsSuite"


[info] Run completed in 9 seconds, 31 milliseconds.
[info] Total number of tests run: 61
[info] Suites: completed 1, aborted 0
[info] Tests: succeeded 61, failed 0, canceled 0, ignored 0, pending 0
[info] All tests passed.

 

java -version
openjdk version "17.0.14" 2025-01-21 LTS
OpenJDK Runtime Environment Zulu17.56+15-CA (build 17.0.14+7-LTS)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Zulu17.56+15-CA (build 17.0.14+7-LTS, mixed mode, sharing) 

build/sbt clean "core/testOnly org.apache.spark.util.UtilsSuite"


[info] - SPARK-35907: createDirectory *** FAILED *** (29 milliseconds)

Failed GA  case:

 

  • https://github.com/fanyue-xia/oss-spark/actions/runs/12898429992/job/35965502986

item.summary: When using Java version 17.0.14, the `SPARK-35907: createDirectory` test in UtilsSuite will fail.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Java 17.0.14 aligns more closely with the behavior of Java 21, but I haven't figured out the specific changes yet.

 

cc dongjoon gurwls223

Issue resolved by pull request 49599
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/49599
